Title: Taken 3
Overview: Ex-government operative Bryan Mills finds his life is shattered when he's falsely accused of a murder that hits close to home. As he's pursued by a savvy police inspector, Mills employs his particular set of skills to track the real killer and exact his unique brand of justice.
Keywords: revenge, murder, on the run, fugitive, framed, father daughter relationship, framed for murder
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, M6 Films, Canal+, Grive Productions, EuropaCorp, Ciné+, M6, TSG Entertainment, Taken 3
Cast: Liam Neeson, Forest Whitaker, Maggie Grace
